alert.note: Alert for Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 3:53AM CDT until May 25 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR EASTERN GAINES COUNTY... At 351 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Seagraves, moving southeast at 30 mph. At 345 AM CDT, a 61 mph wind gust was measured at the Seagraves mesonet. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Mesonet measured. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Seagraves, Seagraves Airport, Loop, McKenzie Lake and Gaines County Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
